#!/bin/bash

echo "🔍 Checking Codex CLI readiness..."

score=0 total=6

check() { echo -n "\$1... " if eval "\$2"; then echo "✅" ((score++))
else echo "❌" fi }

# Check OS

OS=$(uname -s)
if [[ "$OS" == "Linux" \|\| "\$OS" == "Darwin" \]\]; then echo "🖥️ OS
detected: \$OS ✅" ((score++)) else echo "🖥️ OS detected: \$OS ❌
(Codex CLI works best on Linux/macOS or WSL2)" fi

# Check Node.js

check "Node.js installed" "command -v node \>/dev/null && node -v \|
grep -q 'v'"

# Check npm

check "npm installed" "command -v npm \>/dev/null && npm -v \| grep -q
'[^1]'"

[^1]: 0-9

# Check Git

check "Git installed" "command -v git \>/dev/null && git --version \|
grep -q 'git version'"

# Check GitHub CLI (optional)

check "GitHub CLI (gh) installed (optional)" "command -v gh
\>/dev/null"

# Check OpenAI API key

check "OpenAI API Key set" "\[\[ -n \$OPENAI_API_KEY \]\] \|\| grep -q
'OPENAI_API_KEY' .env 2\>/dev/null"

echo "" echo "✅ $score/$total readiness checks passed."

if \[ "$score" -eq "$total" \]; then echo "🚀 System is ready to
install and use Codex CLI." elif \[ "\$score" -ge 4 \]; then echo "⚠️
Mostly ready — consider fixing the missing items above." else echo "❌
System not ready. Please install missing tools before proceeding." fi
